page.title: 06Our Diet.
page.content: We measured and recorded everything we ate in one day. We asked family and friends to join in. Then we checked to see if our diet was balanced. Most children in our class had too many carboydrates. They had too many sweets and not enough VITAMINS or PROTEINS. Only about four children didn't have any sweets all day they had fruit instead. Children's diets could be improved by limiting the quantity of sweets eaten. They would'nt get tooth decay and have healthier bodies. I did not have a balanced diet. I had mostly carbohydrates but at least I had proteins. I think I had too many carbohydrates because most food was made of lots of sugar. I didn't have enough vitamins.If we had'nt made Ratatouille or the other things we had at school I would'nt have had any vitamins.
